title: Who is leading Karen Read’s defense in wrongful death suit?
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News First there was Jackson and Yannetti.
Now, a new contender has taken up Karen Read’s cause.
Karen Read talks with her lawyer Damon Seligson in Plymouth Superior Court on Monday September 22, 2025.

title: Nick Saban calls out Bill Belichick, Patriots coaching staff for stalling Mac Jones’ development
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “I think Mac was one of those guys who was in bad situations relative to coaching and all that type of stuff.
" Bill Belichick and Nick Saban have been friends for decades.
AP Photo/Butch Dill Nick Saban has been friends with Bill Belichick for decades as the two forged their respective paths as some of the greatest coaches in football history.

title: 5 takeaways from Red Sox’ season-ending press conference
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox "No one will sit in this seat and say that there’s enough pitching in the organization.

title: Bill Belichick reportedly instructed UNC staff to not mention Patriots players on social media
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "That's clearly why UNC football has not posted anything from Drake Maye's electric primetime win over the Buffalo Bills.
” Bill Belichick and the Tar Heels are 2-3 so far this season.

AP Photo/Chris Seward By Conor Ryan October 6, 2025 | 6:18 PM 2 minutes to read Drake Maye put forth the best performance of his young NFL career on Sunday night against the Bills, out-dueling Josh Allen and helping New England beat Buffalo, 23-20, in a primetime matchup.

title: Fall River man charged with murder, allegedly told police he stabbed former cellmate
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime Robert Hodgson allegedly called 911 to report the stabbing before he was arrested.
His competency to stand trial will be evaluated Tuesday.
Court officers and local police outside Fall River District Court.

title: There’s real treasure hidden around Boston this week — here’s how to join the hunt
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Community Stack’s Bowers Galleries is giving away gold coins and rare currency worth more than $10,000.
Here's the first clue.
Bostonians can go treasure hunting this week — with prizes that include rare coins and historic bank notes worth more than $10,000.

title: 5 takeaways from Bruins’ season-opening press conference
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins “I think teams are going to circle playing against the Bruins and go — ‘Oh, damn, we got to play them tonight.
’" Don Sweeney and Cam Neely fielded questions from TD Garden on Monday.

title: On ESPN’s First Take, Cam Newton praises Drake Maye for ‘unbelievable job’ vs. Bills
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "Drake Maye did an unbelievable job of managing the game" Drake Maye.
Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe Drake Maye earned some praise from one of his childhood heroes on Monday.
The Patriots quarterback grew up in the Charlotte area as a Panthers fan, and Cam Newton was his favorite player.

title: Making sense of Bruins’ final roster cuts of training camp

bullets: Boston Bruins The Bruins made their final roster cuts on Sunday afternoon now that the preseason wrapped.
